page.title: 17TRANSPORT
page.content: The{Motorway}(M11) The motorway is always very busy espially in the mornings and evenings when lorries cars and other vehicles are driven to the large towns and cities. Approximately 572 vehicles go in the direction of Cambridge and 607 go to London,in 20 minutes. The motorway was built in 1976 and opened for use in 1979.A few people who live near the motorway who were previously on generated electricity changed to mains when the motorway was built.This was because the mains electricity was redirected and is now able to reach there homes. The motorway acts as a link between London and its{commuter belt}.It gives much easier{access}to London and Cambridge.
